title: Natural Language Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to understand my natural speech so that I can interact comfortably without needing to learn specific commands.

title: Voice Feedback for User Interactions
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive clear and friendly audio feedback for my interactions with ALFRED so that I can understand the system's responses and feel reassured about the actions taken.

title: Personalized Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want to set personalized reminders for my tasks through voice commands so that I can manage my daily activities and appointments without forgetting them.

title: Multimodal Interaction for Independence
summary: As an older adult, I want to interact with ALFRED using both voice and touch controls so that I can manage my daily tasks easily and feel empowered.

title: User-Friendly Onboarding Process
summary: As an older adult, I want a straightforward onboarding process that guides me through the initial setup and familiarizes me with the system functionalities so that I can use ALFRED independently and confidently.

title: Contextual Help and Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide contextual help and support during my interactions so that I can receive assistance when I struggle without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.
